Label: Narrative
Text: The MOVING reference member state of this VC (Value Chain) is SWITZERLAND 1. The reference MOVING Card ID of this VC is VC 29 CH1. This is an example of an innovative small local carpentry in Tenna, Grisons using only local wood and producing traditional as well as modern furniture and other wood products. The production is in the area of a nature park and is sold with a corresponding label.   The reference mountain chain of this VC is unspecified. Overall the type of challenge faced by this VC is Current. This VC is classified as Traditional and Innovative.   The type of innovation of this VC (Value Chain) is Endogenous and Exogenous. uses traditional materials and practices, but makes modern products, e.g. trendy furniture. The innovation is related to New products. The land use systems involved are Forestry. The local assets include Natural, social and cultural.   Similar carpentries are present all over the alps.
